short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easy way to download videos from The Internet Archive.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Internet Archive Downloader is a tool to more easily download videos from The Internet Archive.  This tool is locked down to just archive.org, but could be expanded to other sites in the future.

How to use:
When you are viewing a video file on the website, you can click the extension icon.  If the extension can find the video file, it will display a blue download button in the popup.  Clicking it will begin the download.

Disclaimer:
This tool and SaltByte.com is not associated with The Internet Archive in any way, shape, or form.  This tool is entirely made for the ease of use on the site.  If there are any issues with the tool, please email SaltedByte@gmail.com for support or feature suggestions.
